name: Website Tooltips | BRIX Templates
description:
Looking to add a tooltip to your pricing table, or any other part of your website? Duplicate one of our 12 free tooltips Figma templates.


What's included in this Tooltip Figma Template from BRIX Templates?


  • Figma Cloneable
  • Webflow Cloneable


Want to get the Webflow cloneable to use these website tooltips on your Webflow website? Clone it today from the Webflow Showcase.
